user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me an update about how the wellness program is going and to check his Notion for information. Have him email me at angela.richardson@zenithglobal.com.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Wellness Program Update Request

Hi John,

Could you please send me a brief update on how the wellness program is progressing? Also, when you have a moment, check your Notion workspace for the latest information and resources related to the initiative. 

Kindly email your update to me at angela.richardson@zenithglobal.com.

Thank you!

Best regards,  
Angela

final_output:
